document_data.caption: Cate's urn and Drusilla's corpse.
document_data.name: Cate
document_data.mainbody: '''Cate''' was the sister of an eccentric [[alchemist]] who lived in her old houseboat tethered to the [[Fisher's Wharf]] in [[Baldur's Gate/Eastway|Eastway]] in [[Baldur's Gate]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: By the {{YearlinkName|1477}}, Cate had already been long dead. Her sister [[Drusilla]] still cherished Cate's memory. The alchemist kept Cate's remains in a [[terra cotta]] urn decorated with a cameo of her face. When Drusilla made [[tea]], she served a set of [[clay]] mugs for the sister, placing them in front of the urn. The alchemist made tea with [[honeycomb]] like Cate liked it in life.
